analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xec82fffd7c1961904fdbb4cbd98f06d9dd0870a8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_contracts/0xec82fffd7c1961904fdbb4cbd98f06d9dd0870a8.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of DeltaChainToken.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0xec82fffd7c1961904fdbb4cbd98f06d9dd0870a8.sol#201) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of DeltaChainToken.transfer (/unique_contracts/0xec82fffd7c1961904fdbb4cbd98f06d9dd0870a8.sol#210) is not in mixedCase

Parameter '_amount' of DeltaChainToken.distr (/unique_contracts/0xec82fffd7c1961904fdbb4cbd98f06d9dd0870a8.sol#139) is not in mixedCase
